channel.title: map leak after defeating the tentacles [Fixed]
channel.description:
In Blast Pit, after defeating the tentacles and going down the ladder, there is a map leak to the right of the ladder (I believe it is only on the map that loads when you are on the ladder, but I could be wrong).
I have an image of the leak attached. ![2012-09-15_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://1YVjIWlosVvRSY4I4fpVnn8qUJZ.jpeg)

item.title: map leak after defeating the tentacles [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
To be fair, it’s not a proper “leak” in source mapping terminology, could even be absent in the editor but only shows up after compile. A leak would produce many more bugs such as fullbright and no VVIS optimizations.

Read full topic
item.source: map leak after defeating the tentacles [Fixed]

item.title: map leak after defeating the tentacles [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: OCDMonkey
item.description:
Nolife Demon:

I Did have this same problem, but after moving slightly down the ladder it resolved and vanished.

it only seems to resolve itself because of the “hall of mirrors” effect. I have to turn on the flashlight for it to be clearly visible.

Read full topic
